description: Initially Ryouta is a bully in elementary school, pushing Komori. Gorou and Shimizu stand up to him and he eventually backs down after Gorou hits him for trying to throw his baseball glove into the river. He soon realises that he doesn`t have any real friends and asks Gorou if he can play baseball with him, Shimizu and Komori. He remains friends with Komori, Shimizu, and Gorou.
name: Sawamura Ryouta
